DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop refine technique use magnetic resonance optical spectroscopy investigate body use energy .
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Study Objective : To evaluate reproducibility acquire multi-nuclear data new 3T Philips Magnet conjunction Optical Spectroscopy .
DOC.criteria: Male female Age 18 89 Healthy ( self assess ) Weight 350lbs Able walk 50 yard without stop Able travel hospital study visit Able follow 3step command Able remain magnetic resonance ( MR ) scanner 2 hour Have internal metal medical device , include cardiac pacemaker , aortic cerebral aneurysm clip , artificial heart valve , ferromagnetic implant , shrapnel , wire suture , joint replacement , bone joint pins/rods/screws , metal fragment eye , nonremovable jewelry ring . Are unwilling unable complete imaging procedure duration magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) scan due claustrophobia reason . Serious mental illness might preclude subject 's ability comply study treatment Are pregnant plan become pregnant next 8 week . History deep vein thrombosis ( DVT ) pulmonary embolism ( PE ) Varicose Veins Known genetic factor ( Factor V Leiden , etc . ) hypercoagulable state , include cancer , leukemia chronic myelocytic leukemia ( CML ) , hemoglobinopathies sicklecell disease multiple myeloma proteinopathies . Diagnosed peripheral arterial vascular disease Family history primary DVT PE Peripheral neuropathy History chronic venous stasis lower extremity edema Female take hormonal birth control ( oral otherwise ) AND smoker
